description: Evaluates a specified session based on audio data accumulated during a streaming Amazon Connect Voice ID call.

parameters.name: DomainId
parameters.description: The identifier of the domain where the session started.

parameters.name: SessionNameOrId
parameters.description: The session identifier, or name of the session, that you want to evaluate. In Voice ID integration, this is the Contact-Id.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationResult
nested_items.description: Details resulting from the authentication process, such as authentication decision and authentication score.

nested_items.name: AudioAggregationEndedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when audio aggregation ended for this authentication result.

nested_items.name: AudioAggregationStartedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when audio aggregation started for this authentication result.

nested_items.name: AuthenticationResultId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this authentication result. Because there can be multiple authentications for a given session, this field helps to identify if the returned result is from a previous streaming activity or a new result. Note that in absence of any new streaming activity, AcceptanceThreshold changes, or SpeakerId changes, Voice ID always returns cached Authentication Result for this API.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The AuthenticationConfiguration used to generate this authentication result.

nested_items.name: AcceptanceThreshold
nested_items.description: The minimum threshold needed to successfully authenticate a speaker.

nested_items.name: CustomerSpeakerId
nested_items.description: The client-provided identifier for the speaker whose authentication result is produced. Only present if a SpeakerId is provided for the session.

nested_items.name: Decision
nested_items.description: The authentication decision produced by Voice ID, processed against the current session state and streamed audio of the speaker.

nested_items.name: GeneratedSpeakerId
nested_items.description: The service-generated identifier for the speaker whose authentication result is produced.

nested_items.name: Score
nested_items.description: The authentication score for the speaker whose authentication result is produced. This value is only present if the authentication decision is either ACCEPT or REJECT.

nested_items.name: DomainId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the domain that contains the session.

nested_items.name: FraudDetectionResult
nested_items.description: Details resulting from the fraud detection process, such as fraud detection decision and risk score.

nested_items.name: AudioAggregationEndedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when audio aggregation ended for this fraud detection result.

nested_items.name: AudioAggregationStartedAt
nested_items.description: A timestamp of when audio aggregation started for this fraud detection result.

nested_items.name: Configuration
nested_items.description: The FraudDetectionConfiguration used to generate this fraud detection result.

nested_items.name: RiskThreshold
nested_items.description: Threshold value for determining whether the speaker is a fraudster. If the detected risk score calculated by Voice ID is higher than the threshold, the speaker is considered a fraudster.

nested_items.name: WatchlistId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the watchlist against which fraud detection is performed.

nested_items.name: Decision
nested_items.description: The fraud detection decision produced by Voice ID, processed against the current session state and streamed audio of the speaker.

nested_items.name: FraudDetectionResultId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for this fraud detection result. Given there can be multiple fraud detections for a given session, this field helps in identifying if the returned result is from previous streaming activity or a new result. Note that in the absence of any new streaming activity or risk threshold changes, Voice ID always returns cached Fraud Detection result for this API.

nested_items.name: Reasons
nested_items.description: The reason speaker was flagged by the fraud detection system. This is only be populated if fraud detection Decision is HIGH_RISK, and the following possible values: KNOWN_FRAUDSTER and VOICE_SPOOFING.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: RiskDetails
nested_items.description: Details about each risk analyzed for this speaker. Currently, this contains KnownFraudsterRisk and VoiceSpoofingRisk details.

nested_items.name: KnownFraudsterRisk
nested_items.description: The details resulting from --Known Fraudster Risk' analysis of the speaker.

nested_items.name: GeneratedFraudsterId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the fraudster that is the closest match to the speaker. If there are no fraudsters registered in a given domain, or if there are no fraudsters with a non-zero RiskScore, this value is null.

nested_items.name: RiskScore
nested_items.description: The score indicating the likelihood the speaker is a known fraudster.

nested_items.name: VoiceSpoofingRisk
nested_items.description: The details resulting from --Voice Spoofing Risk' analysis of the speaker.

nested_items.name: RiskScore
nested_items.description: The score indicating the likelihood of speaker's voice being spoofed.

nested_items.name: SessionId
nested_items.description: The service-generated identifier of the session.

nested_items.name: SessionName
nested_items.description: The client-provided name of the session.

nested_items.name: StreamingStatus
nested_items.description: The current status of audio streaming for this session. This field is useful to infer next steps when the Authentication or Fraud Detection results are empty or the decision is NOT_ENOUGH_SPEECH. In this situation, if the StreamingStatus is ONGOING/PENDING_CONFIGURATION, it can mean that the client should call the API again later, after Voice ID has enough audio to produce a result. If the decision remains NOT_ENOUGH_SPEECH even after StreamingStatus is ENDED, it means that the previously streamed session did not have enough speech to perform evaluation, and a new streaming session is needed to try again.
